title: HOW to use emotes?
body:
I have bought a couple emotes, notably a Fiora one.
I looked through all my settings and key bindings and I could not figure out which button I had to press to use my emotes. 

AND YES, i did equip them and SAVE it in the collections> emotes tab.

Idk if this is important but i've only tested it in practise tool..

I looked online and found that its normally binded to the T button but I already have my "it's warded here" ping on my T button.
I then thought.. maybe I should restore all my buttons to default and then press T in hope my emotes would show up. NOPE.

So to anyone who has emotes working for them.. what button do I press?


Edit: figured it out.. impossible to use in practise tool. Wonder why..

replies.body: They just aren't enabled in practice tool for the time being, glad you figured that out before I had the chance to answer!

Yeah, no problem.

One more thing worth mentioning is that when I was scrimming another team yesterday my emotes didnt work either. You can't use emotes in practise tool+ tournament draft.
